<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Apprentice](/NPCs.aspx?ID=955)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Ambitious apprentices can be found in all cities. These individuals are generally younger and seek the approval of their masters as they learn their craft. Many yearn to exemplify the artistry behind their craft, one day becoming masters themselves. Depicted below is an apprentice cartographer.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 13

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 8
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/NPCs/Tradesperson_Apprentice.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature -1">[Apprentice](/NPCs.aspx?ID=955)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 244</row>

**Perception** +2

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +3, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +5, [Geography Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +5

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +2

**Con** +1

**Int** +3

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[Artisan's Tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3), assorted maps, rugged clothes with tool belt (functions as [padded armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=3))

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 15 

**Fort** +5 

**Ref** +6 

**Will** +2 

</row>

**HP** 8

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +3 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+1 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +4 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+1 piercing

**Apprentice's Ambition** <actions string="Free Action" />  **Frequency** once per day; **Requirements** A direct superior is supervising the apprentice; **Effect** The apprentice gains a +2 circumstance bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, saving throws, and skill checks until the end of their next turn.

</column>
